程序包 Entity

类 SavingAccount

java.lang.Object
Entity.Account
Entity.SavingAccount
public class SavingAccount extends Account
The SavingAccount class represents a type of bank account that earns interest over a specified period. It extends the Account class.

  • 字段概要

    从类继承的字段 Entity.Account

    balance, interestRate

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    SavingAccount(String name)
    Constructs a SavingAccount with the specified name and initializes the start and end time to the current time.
    SavingAccount(String name, double initialBalance, double interestRate, LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
    Constructs a SavingAccount with the specified name, initial balance, interest rate, start time, and end time.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • SavingAccount

      public SavingAccount(String name)
      Constructs a SavingAccount with the specified name and initializes the start and end time to the current time.
      参数:
      name - the name of the account holder

    • SavingAccount

      public SavingAccount(String name, double initialBalance, double interestRate, LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
      Constructs a SavingAccount with the specified name, initial balance, interest rate, start time, and end time.
      参数:
      name - the name of the account holder
      initialBalance - the initial balance of the account
      interestRate - the interest rate of the account
      startTime - the start time of the saving period
      endTime - the end time of the saving period

    • calculateInterest

      public void calculateInterest()
      从类复制的说明: Account
      Abstract method to calculate interest for the account. Subclasses must provide an implementation for this method.
      指定者:
      calculateInterest 在类中 Account
